title: Self-Directed Mobile-Based Interface Design and Implementation Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in Basic Programming Concepts and Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills
context.additional_context: Designed for intermediate-expertise learners in managerial/leadership roles, conducted in digital device-supported environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design a mobile-based math problem-solving UI prototype with 80% accuracy

Learners can achieve a 20% or higher improvement in software self-efficacy survey scores by the end of the course
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
